## CommunicationObserver.next() method

Data chunk received, can be called multiple times.

**Signature:**

```typescript
next(data: T): void | boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | T | data |

**Returns:**

void \| boolean

when `false` value is returned and [CommunicationObserver.useResume](./influxdb3-client.communicationobserver.useresume.md) is defined, future calls to `next` are paused until resume is called.
